entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming clear late in the evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
